attributes.action: Impliment compulsory periodic Theory Driving Tests for All Licence holders in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I submitt that a theory test taken every 5 to 10 years by All drivers in the UK, including any visitng drivers who's stay exeeds 6 months, would significantly reduce the excessive carnage and waste of lives on our roads today. At present there is No way to control the amount of bad drivers on our roads untill it's to late and they have killed someone, perhaps one of our own kin. to Add your signature to this petition is not only the responsible thing to do but also shows you favour Safe Roads for the Majority of road users.
